metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14265 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A Stack-based Buffer Overflow was discovered in xtrans_interpolate in internal/dcraw_common.cpp in LibRaw before 0.18.3. It could allow a remote denial of service or code execution attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-14265` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.18.5-1
libraw20 - 0.18.5-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: leosilva> the two lines entry in changelog refers for CVE-2017-13735 and this CVE respectively

criterions.comment: darktable package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
kodi package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
libraw package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.18.5-1').
rawtherapee package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
